name: hu2D6140
comments: born very blond and my hair color darkened over the years to a light brown.  At age 73 it I beginning to grey, but most of my hair is still the natural color.  My father did not go grey until late 70s

name: hu4BF398
comments: Age is turning hair white.  Body hair is still blond.

name: hu2C1D94
hair_detailed: Reddish brown on head, bright red in beard
comments: Head hair and beard hair are different colors -- brown with a reddish tint on head, but bright red beard. My dad's hair was similarly disparate until he went grey.

name: hu60180F
comments: I was a light blond and then turned to an ash blond

name: huDBF9DD
comments: I was born with red hair that went blonde until (maybe) second grade, and then eventually turned brown somehow.

name: hu627574
comments: I was a blond as a child, my hair turned light brown around 12 and had some red/gold in it, then in my 20's turned a bit darker.  I started getting some gray hair around 26 and I am almost all gray at 55.

name: hu7123C1
comments: As a child "dishwater" blonde from 1 to 20 yo , and gradually darkening to brown as an adult from age 21 to 50 yo; and with aging from 51 to 69 yo increasing gray (initially in beard and then scalp).

name: huC14AE1
hair_detailed: Dark blonde, nearing light brown in color.
comments: When younger, my hair was considerably lighter--almost a towhead, particularly in the summer.  As I aged, my hair darkened considerably and does not bleach in the light like it used to.

name: huF83462
comments: grayish blonde

name: huC5733C
comments: Bright blonde when young, became dirty blonde, now almost white.

name: hu04F220
comments: Used to be red

name: huDBD591
comments: Born fully blonde

name: hu5E55F5
comments: I was born with very blond hair (a towhead) and as I grew older my color changed gradually.

name: hu26B551
comments: My hair was strawberry blonde until age four. Then became light brown with a reddish undertone.

name: hu5CD2C6
comments: childhood blonde;  later light brown; now brown, part grey

name: hu602487
hair_detailed: White in front, grey mixed with light brown behind.
comments:
As a baby and toddler I had very light blond hair -- it looks white in photos. 
It darkened to dark blond by my 20's, with lighter blond in the front (naturally). 

It stayed that way until it began to go grey, then the rest darkened to brown and grey.

name: hu43860C
comments: born platinum blond.  Then reddish light brown.  Then mix of brown-grey-white.

name: hu4BE6F2
comments: Born blond, turned light brown as I got older, then darker brown in adulthood. At 44, slightly greyed.

name: huB1488D
comments: I was born with blonde hair. It took on both a darker and more reddish hue at about age 13-14. My hair began turning gray at age 23.

name: huED0F40
hair_detailed: Brown w/ smattering of mostly-white, some gray, at temples
comments: Dirty-blonde hair color in early childhood that darkened to a light brown, gradually, between ages 9-12. Alopecia on males from mother's side of family, w/ maternal uncle having receding hairline at 28. Father's side has thick, coarse-haired males. My hair receded somewhat in late 30s, but not tracking to balding

name: hu49F623
comments: I had rust reddish hair as a kid before it turned deep dark black hair. at least that is what i was told.

name: huD649F1
hair_detailed: Medium blond with red highlights. As a child 'strawberry blond.'
comments:
I was a 'towhead' blonde - nearly white blond as a young child. Then settled to strawberry blond. That's continued, now mixed with gray. 

My hair is naturally straight.

name: hu79F922
comments: Towhead at age 2 to age 12. Now mousy, formerly blond, light brown. Gray around edges.

name: hu52B7E5
comments: My hair was much more red when I was younger, with more orange tones. It darkened during my twenties to a brownish red.

name: hu7A2F1D
comments: I was born with blond hair that turned to brown and started turning gray in my 50s and white in my 60s. My eyebrows are still brown but turning gray.

name: hu868880
comments: photos from my childhood show my hair was very blond and it was often described to me as 'strawberry blonde'... as i've gotten older it has gotten darker. my eyebrows are very blonde, my arm hair is very blonde, but the hair on the rest of my body is darker. and the hair on my head is fairly tinged with grey.

name: hu448C4B
comments: Born bald. Not balding now, at age 65. Was dark blonde.

name: hu2DBF2D
hair_detailed: somewhere between light brown and blonde
comments: When I was a baby my hair was reddish blonde, then as a child it was very light blonde, now (30's) my hair is approaching light brown.

name: hu2FEC01
comments: Was born a strawberry blonde
